#Orders
##Order types
```{r fig.cap='Payment Type', echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, error=FALSE}


frame_no_transaction %>% group_by(k_symbol) %>% summarise(amount = sum(amount.y)/1e6) %>%
dplyr::filter(!is.na(k_symbol)) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_col(aes(x = k_symbol, y = amount)) +
  labs(y='Total Amount (millions)',x = 'Payment Type') -> p

ggplotly(p)

```
